text: Die goldene Gans is an East German film, based on the fairy tale Golden Goose. It was released in 1964. ==External links== * Category:1964 films Category:1960s fantasy films Category:German fantasy films Category:German children's films Category:East German films Category:German-language films Category:Films based on Grimms' Fairy Tales Category:Films_based_on_fairy_tales
title: Die goldene Gans
